title: (x) Blue Tattoo script - (similar to) Sloop Script {Ignacio}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232634im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bt_logo_1_-1_6636.jpg_newestsmall_ilx9.jpg)

anyone know what font this is?

 [‹ (x) TDR/The Designers Republic ad - Akkurat {Gregory Cadars}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232634/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38141 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Bagatellemat gjort forståelig" futuristic sans - Enabler {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232634/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38136 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mstecker

comments.content: Custom I guess but I think that [Sloop](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232634/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Sloop/styles) was the starting point.
